Suite.Title: Facebook Insights

JsonPath.Title: Impressions
JsonPath.HelpText: The total number of impressions seen of any content associated with your Page

JsonPath.Title: Impressions Unique
JsonPath.HelpText: The number of people who have seen any content associated with your Page

JsonPath.Title: Paid Impressions
JsonPath.HelpText: The number of impressions of a Sponsored Story or Ad pointing to your Page

JsonPath.Title: Paid Impressions Unique
JsonPath.HelpText: Number of people who saw a sponsored story or Ad about your Page

JsonPath.Title: Clicks
JsonPath.HelpText: The number of times people clicked on any of your content

JsonPath.Title: Clicks Unique
JsonPath.HelpText: The number of people who clicked on any of your content

JsonPath.Title: Negative Feedback
JsonPath.HelpText: The number of times people took a negative action (e.g., un-liked or hid a post)

JsonPath.Title: Negative Feedback Unique
JsonPath.HelpText: The number of people who took a negative action (e.g., un-liked or hid a post)

JsonPath.Title: New Fans
JsonPath.HelpText: The number of new likes of your Page.

JsonPath.Title: Removed Fans
JsonPath.HelpText: The number of unlikes of your Page.

JsonPath.Title: Impressions
JsonPath.HelpText: The total number of impressions seen of any content associated with your Page

JsonPath.Title: Unique
JsonPath.HelpText: The number of people who have seen any content associated with your Page

JsonPath.Title: Paid
JsonPath.HelpText: The number of impressions of a Sponsored Story or Ad pointing to your Page

JsonPath.Title: Paid Unique
JsonPath.HelpText: Number of people who saw a sponsored story or Ad about your Page

JsonPath.Title: Organic
JsonPath.HelpText: The number of times your posts were seen in News Feed or Ticker or on visits to your Page. These impressions can be Fans or non-Fans

JsonPath.Title: Organic Unique
JsonPath.HelpText: The number of people who visited your Page, or saw your Page or one of its posts in News Feed or Ticker. These impressions can be Fans or non-Fans

JsonPath.Title: Viral
JsonPath.HelpText: The number of impressions of a story published by a friend about your Page.

JsonPath.Title: Viral Unique
JsonPath.HelpText: The number of people who saw your Page or one of its posts from a story published by a friend.

JsonPath.Title: Fan
JsonPath.HelpText: Page likes

JsonPath.Title: User Post
JsonPath.HelpText: posts by people on a Page

JsonPath.Title: Page Post
JsonPath.HelpText: posts by a Page

JsonPath.Title: Claim
JsonPath.HelpText: Claim an offer

JsonPath.Title: Answer

JsonPath.Title: Engaged Users
JsonPath.HelpText: The number of people who engaged with your Page. Engagement includes any click

JsonPath.Title: Clicks On Content
JsonPath.HelpText: The number of times people clicked on any of your content

JsonPath.Title: Unique Clicks On Content
JsonPath.HelpText: The number of people who clicked on any of your content

JsonPath.Title: Check-Ins
JsonPath.HelpText: The number of times people checked into a place

JsonPath.Title: Check-Ins Unique
JsonPath.HelpText: The number of people who checked into a place

JsonPath.Title: Check-Ins Mobile
JsonPath.HelpText: The number of times people checked into a place using mobile phones

JsonPath.Title: Check-Ins Mobile Unique
JsonPath.HelpText: The number of people who checked into a place using mobile phones

JsonPath.Title: Negative Feedback
JsonPath.HelpText: The number of times people took a negative action (e.g., un-liked or hid a post)

JsonPath.Title: Negative Feedback Unique
JsonPath.HelpText: The number of people who took a negative action (e.g., un-liked or hid a post)

JsonPath.Title: Stories Total
JsonPath.HelpText: The number of stories created about your Page (Stories)

JsonPath.Title: Like
JsonPath.HelpText: Daily total post LIKE reactions of a page

JsonPath.Title: Like
JsonPath.HelpText: Total post LIKE reactions

JsonPath.Title: Love
JsonPath.HelpText: Total post LOVE reactions

JsonPath.Title: Wow
JsonPath.HelpText: Total post WOW reactions

JsonPath.Title: Haha
JsonPath.HelpText: Total post HAHA reactions

JsonPath.Title: Sorry
JsonPath.HelpText: Total post SORRY reactions

JsonPath.Title: Anger
JsonPath.HelpText: Total post ANGER reactions

JsonPath.Title: Total Fans
JsonPath.HelpText: The total number of people who have liked your Page.

JsonPath.Title: New Fans
JsonPath.HelpText: The number of new likes of your Page.

JsonPath.Title: Removed Fans
JsonPath.HelpText: The number of unlikes of your Page.

JsonPath.Title: Views
JsonPath.HelpText: Total number of times page's videos have been viewed for more than 3 seconds

JsonPath.Title: Unique
JsonPath.HelpText: Total number of times page's promoted videos have been viewed for more than 3 seconds

JsonPath.Title: Paid
JsonPath.HelpText: Total number of times page's promoted videos have been viewed for more than 3 seconds

JsonPath.Title: Organic
JsonPath.HelpText: Total number of times page's videos have been viewed for more than 3 seconds by organic reach

JsonPath.Title: Autoplayed
JsonPath.HelpText: Total number of times page's autoplayed videos have been viewed for more than 3 seconds

JsonPath.Title: Clicked
JsonPath.HelpText: Total number of times page's videos have been viewed after the user clicks on play for more than 3 seconds

JsonPath.Title: Repeated
JsonPath.HelpText: Total number of times that people replay a page's videos for more than 3 seconds

JsonPath.Title: Views > 30s
JsonPath.HelpText: Total number of times page's videos have been viewed for more than 30 seconds

JsonPath.Title: Views > 30s Unique
JsonPath.HelpText: Total number of times page's videos have been played for unique people to the end, or viewed for more than 30 seconds

JsonPath.Title: Views > 30s Paid
JsonPath.HelpText: Total number of times page's promoted videos have been viewed to the end, or for more than 30 seconds

JsonPath.Title: Views > 30s Organic
JsonPath.HelpText: Total number of times page's videos have been viewed to the end, or viewed for more than 30 seconds by organic reach

JsonPath.Title: Views > 30s Autoplayed
JsonPath.HelpText: Total number of times page's autoplayed videos have been viewed to the end, or viewed for more than 30 seconds

JsonPath.Title: Views > 30s Clicked
JsonPath.HelpText: Total number of times page's videos have been viewed to the end, or viewed after the user clicks on play for more than 30 seconds

JsonPath.Title: Views > 30s Repeated
JsonPath.HelpText: Total number of times that people replay a page's videos to the end, or for more than 30 seconds

JsonPath.Title: Impressions
JsonPath.HelpText: The number of impressions that came from all of your posts

JsonPath.Title: Unique
JsonPath.HelpText: The number of people who saw any of your Page posts

JsonPath.Title: Paid
JsonPath.HelpText: The number of impressions of your Page posts in an Ad or Sponsored Story

JsonPath.Title: Paid Unique
JsonPath.HelpText: The number of people who saw your Page posts in an Ad or Sponsored Story

JsonPath.Title: Organic
JsonPath.HelpText: The number of impressions of your posts in News Feed or Ticker or on your Page

JsonPath.Title: Organic Unique
JsonPath.HelpText: The number of people who saw your Page posts in News Feed or Ticker, or on your Page's Wall

JsonPath.Title: Viral
JsonPath.HelpText: The number of times users saw your posts via stories published by their friends

JsonPath.Title: Viral Unique
JsonPath.HelpText: The number of people who saw your Page posts via a story from a friend

JsonPath.Title: Impressions
JsonPath.HelpText: The number of impressions for your Page post

JsonPath.Title: Unique
JsonPath.HelpText: The number of people who saw your Page post

JsonPath.Title: Paid
JsonPath.HelpText: The number of impressions for your Page post in an Ad or Sponsored Story

JsonPath.Title: Paid Unique
JsonPath.HelpText: The number of people who saw your Page post in an Ad or Sponsored Story

JsonPath.Title: Fan
JsonPath.HelpText: The number of impressions for your Page post by people who have liked your Page

JsonPath.Title: Fan Unique
JsonPath.HelpText: The number of people who have like your Page who saw your Page post

JsonPath.Title: Fan Paid
JsonPath.HelpText: The number of impressions for your Page post by people who like your Page in an Ad or Sponsored Story

JsonPath.Title: Fan Paid Unique
JsonPath.HelpText: The number of people who have like your Page and saw your Page post in an Ad or Sponsored Story

JsonPath.Title: Organic
JsonPath.HelpText: The number of impressions of your post in Newsfeed, Ticker, or on your Page's Wall

JsonPath.Title: Organic Unique
JsonPath.HelpText: The number of people who saw your post in their Newsfeed or Ticker or on your Page's Wall

JsonPath.Title: Viral
JsonPath.HelpText: The number of impressions of your Page post in a story generated by a friend

JsonPath.Title: Viral Unique
JsonPath.HelpText: The number of people who saw your page post in a story from a friend

JsonPath.Title: Impressions
JsonPath.HelpText: The number of impressions for your Page post

JsonPath.Title: Impressions Unique
JsonPath.HelpText: The number of people who saw your Page post

JsonPath.Title: Paid Impressions
JsonPath.HelpText: The number of impressions for your Page post in an Ad or Sponsored Story

JsonPath.Title: Paid Impressions Unique
JsonPath.HelpText: The number of people who saw your Page post in an Ad or Sponsored Story

JsonPath.Title: Clicks
JsonPath.HelpText: The number of times people clicked on anywhere in your posts without generating a story

JsonPath.Title: Clicks Unique
JsonPath.HelpText: The number of people who clicked anywhere in your posts

JsonPath.Title: Shares
JsonPath.HelpText: Number of Shares

JsonPath.Title: Likes
JsonPath.HelpText: Number of Likes

JsonPath.Title: Comments
JsonPath.HelpText: Number of Comments

JsonPath.Title: Link Clicks
JsonPath.HelpText: Clicks on links.

JsonPath.Title: Photo Views
JsonPath.HelpText: View a photo.

JsonPath.Title: Video Plays
JsonPath.HelpText: Playing a video.

JsonPath.Title: Video Views
JsonPath.HelpText: The number of times your video was watched for an aggregate of at least 3 seconds, or for nearly its total length, whichever happened first.

Compute.Title: Post Id

JsonPath.Title: Engaged Users
JsonPath.HelpText: The number of people who clicked anywhere in your posts

JsonPath.Title: Clicks
JsonPath.HelpText: The number of times people clicked on anywhere in your posts without generating a story

JsonPath.Title: Clicks Unique
JsonPath.HelpText: The number of people who clicked anywhere in your post without generating a story

JsonPath.Title: Negative Feedback
JsonPath.HelpText: The number of times people took a negative action in your post (e.g. hid it)

JsonPath.Title: Negative Feedback Unique
JsonPath.HelpText: The number of people who took a negative action in your post (e.g., hid it)

JsonPath.Title: Fan Engagement
JsonPath.HelpText: People who have liked your page and engaged with your post.

JsonPath.Title: Video Length (ms)
JsonPath.HelpText: Length of a video post (in milliseconds)

JsonPath.Title: Average WatchTime (ms)
JsonPath.HelpText: The average length of time (in milliseconds) people spent viewing your video

JsonPath.Title: Total Watch Time (ms)
JsonPath.HelpText: The total number of milliseconds your video was watched, including replays and views less than 3 seconds.

JsonPath.Title: Total Watch Time Organic (ms)
JsonPath.HelpText: Total time (in milliseconds) video has been viewed without paid promotion

JsonPath.Title: Views
JsonPath.HelpText: The number of times your video was watched for an aggregate of at least 3 seconds, or for nearly its total length, whichever happened first.

JsonPath.Title: Unique
JsonPath.HelpText: The number of distinct people who viewed your video at least once.

JsonPath.Title: Views > 10s
JsonPath.HelpText: Number of unique viewers who watched your video for 10 seconds or to the end, whichever happened first

JsonPath.Title: Sound On
JsonPath.HelpText: Number of times your video was viewed with sound on for 3 seconds or viewed to the end, whichever happened first

JsonPath.Title: Autoplayed
JsonPath.HelpText: Number of times your video started automatically playing and people viewed it for more than 3 seconds

JsonPath.Title: Clicked
JsonPath.HelpText: Number of times people clicked to play your video and viewed it more than 3 seconds

JsonPath.Title: Organic
JsonPath.HelpText: The number of times your video was organically viewed for 3 seconds or more

JsonPath.Title: Organic Unique
JsonPath.HelpText: The number of people who viewed at least 3 seconds of your video organically

JsonPath.Title: Organic Paid
JsonPath.HelpText: The number of times your video was viewed via paid impression for 3 seconds or more

JsonPath.Title: Organic Paid Unique
JsonPath.HelpText: The number of people who viewed at least 3 seconds of your video via paid impression

JsonPath.Title: Organic Complete
JsonPath.HelpText: The number of times your video was organically viewed from the beginning to 95% of its length

JsonPath.Title: Organic Complete Unique
JsonPath.HelpText: The number of people who viewed your video organically from the beginning to 95% of its length

JsonPath.Title: Organic Complete Paid
JsonPath.HelpText: The number of times your video was viewed via paid impression from the beginning to 95% of its length

JsonPath.Title: Organic Complete Paid Unique
JsonPath.HelpText: The number of people who viewed your video via paid impression from the beginning to 95% of its length

JsonPath.Title: Views
JsonPath.HelpText: The number of times your video was watched for an aggregate of at least 3 seconds, or for nearly its total length, whichever happened first.

JsonPath.Title: Total WatchTime (ms)
JsonPath.HelpText: The total number of milliseconds your video was watched, including replays and views less than 3 seconds.

JsonPath.Title: Total WatchTime Organic (ms)
JsonPath.HelpText: Total time (in milliseconds) video has been viewed without paid promotion

JsonPath.Title: Paid
JsonPath.HelpText: The number of times your video was viewed via paid impression for 3 seconds or more

JsonPath.Title: Paid > 10s
JsonPath.HelpText: Number of times your video was viewed for 10 seconds or viewed to the end (whichever happened first) with paid promotion

Checkbox.Title: Unique Stories
Checkbox.HelpText: Calculates results for unique post stories.
